data.description:
Leland is a startup focused on unlocking human potential through accessible expertise. As a Product Management Intern, you will support the product development lifecycle and work closely with various teams to enhance the platform.


Responsibilities

  • Conduct user research to identify pain points, opportunities, and areas for improvement
  • Define and document feature requirements, collaborating with engineers and designers to bring them to life
  • Support the product development lifecycle, from idea to launch, ensuring features are delivered effectively
  • Assist in design processes, including wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing
  • Develop product marketing strategies, including messaging and positioning for new features
  • Analyze product data and feedback to inform decisions and optimize user experiences
  • Work cross-functionally with stakeholders across engineering, marketing, and operations

Skills

  • Conduct user research to identify pain points, opportunities, and areas for improvement
  • Define and document feature requirements, collaborating with engineers and designers to bring them to life
  • Support the product development lifecycle, from idea to launch, ensuring features are delivered effectively
  • Assist in design processes, including wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing
  • Develop product marketing strategies, including messaging and positioning for new features
  • Analyze product data and feedback to inform decisions and optimize user experiences
  • Work cross-functionally with stakeholders across engineering, marketing, and operations
  • Curious and analytical – You love understanding users, digging into data, and finding insights to guide decision-making
  • Detail-oriented and organized – You can manage multiple projects and keep track of important details
  • Strong communicator – You're able to clearly convey ideas, whether through writing, presentations, or discussions
  • Self-starter – You take initiative, work independently, and are excited to make an impact in a fast-paced startup
  • Passionate about technology and product development – You're eager to learn how great products are built and scaled
  • Able to work at least ~15 hours per week (ideally 20) and in-office at least 2x per week in Lehi, UT

Company Overview

  • Leland is a coaching marketplace that provides access to coaching, classes, and community for individuals with education and career goals. It was founded in 2021, and is headquartered in Stanford, California, USA, with a workforce of 51-200 employees. Its website is https://www.joinleland.com.

    • Company H1B Sponsorship

  • Leland has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships, with 1 in 2025, 1 in 2022. Please note that this does not guarantee sponsorship for this specific role.
